thread.title: Google launches its Apple Pay challenger Android Pay in the U.S.
thread.title_full: Google launches its Apple Pay challenger Android Pay in the U.S. - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google launches its Apple Pay challenger Android Pay in the U.S.
text: Google is starting to roll out its new digital payment system Android Pay in the U.S. today. The new digital wallet allows users to make payments for purchases in stores with their phone. Android Pay can be downloaded to any phone running an Android operating system of KitKat 4.4 or higher. Upon launch, it will be accepted […] »
